description.displayText: Ayshia helped us for five years with a range of tasks from picking up children at school to cooking, laundry and cleaning. She brought her own recipes to the job and was open to learning new ones. She has a great attitude and lots of energy and was able to adapt to what was most important to us in any given week and to the evolution of her duties as our children became older and more independent, when she helped more around the house.  Ayshia coordinated with us on vacations to align with our needs. She deserves another great family who needs help!
description.originalText: Ayshia helped us for five years with a range of tasks from picking up children at school to cooking, laundry and cleaning. She brought her own recipes to the job and was open to learning new ones. She has a great attitude and lots of energy and was able to adapt to what was most important to us in any given week and to the evolution of her duties as our children became older and more independent, when she helped more around the house.  Ayshia coordinated with us on vacations to align with our needs. She deserves another great family who needs help!

description.displayText: Ayshia worked with us for a month.  At first she seemed amazing taking on more than we requested.  Then we realized she was doing her own thing and neglected certain responsibilities.  She then advised us that she was very ill and in the hospital.  We were genuinely concerned and asked several times the name of the hospital she was admitted to.  She never told us and instead just said that she needed time to recuperate and didn't want us to wait for her return.  If she wanted to quit...all she had to do is say so but instead it dragged out for a week, she left us high and dry and then would not return our house keys.

description.displayText: I hired Ayshia for a job on Thanksgiving day and she totally stood us up and did not answer her phone. I even confirmed with her the day before! Definitely do not hire!
